queries.name: Q1
queries.description: Discover the shortest paths between two entity officers
queries.comment: parameters were obtained with: MATCH (a:Officer) WITH a ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 1 MATCH p=(a)-[:OFFICER_OF|:INTERMEDIARY_OF|:REGISTERED_ADDRESS*8..10]-(b:Officer) RETURN a.name, b.name, length(p) LIMIT 1

queries.name: Q2
queries.comment: parameters were obtained with: MATCH (i:Intermediary) WHERE (i)-[:INTERMEDIARY_OF]->(:Entity)  RETURN i.name ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 100

queries.name: Q7
queries.description: Most popular offshore jurisdiction for people connected to a country
queries.comment:
all sources: MATCH (i:Intermediary) RETURN DISTINCT i.sourceID 
 most popular countries: MATCH (i:Officer) UNWIND i.country_codes AS c RETURN c, count(c) AS f ORDER BY f DESC LIMIT 20

queries.name: Q8
queries.description: Most popular offshore jurisdictions for people with addresses in a certain city
queries.comment:
get some addresses: MATCH (a:Address) RETURN a.address ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 100 
 verify if city is frequent enough: WITH $city AS city MATCH (a:Address) WHERE a.address contains city RETURN city, count(a)
